com.mumfrey.liteloader.util

Class PrivateFields<P,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.util.PrivateFields<P,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - Parent class type, the type of the class that owns the field
    T - Field type, the type of the field value
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrivateFieldsClient

    public class PrivateFields<P,T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for obf/mcp reflection-accessed private fields, mainly added to centralise the locations I have to update the obfuscated field names.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
